Summary: 5 bright golden ufos in night sky
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Bel Air
There were no other sightings in Bel Air on or around September 2nd 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home from Harford Community College after getting out of my night class i drove to a red light by St.Matthews Church(across from safeway) and noticed 4 brightly glowing things in the sky..there were two spaced at the top and then two spaced at the bottom from the top ones..at first i thought they were planes but they were too close together in the sky then i noticed a 5th one a little bit farther away from the other four just gliding around in the sky..the other four seemed to follow closly behind the one that was farther away i dont know how long exactly they were up there because i drove home..but they were so bright with a golden glow around them which made them look like stars but they were too bright to be stars..too close and moving to slow to be planes so im guessing it has to be a ufo!
